title: File:Lusófona Mindelo 02.jpg
author: Joehawkins
description: Memorial in front of the Lusófona university of Cape Verde in Mindelo, a branch of the portuguese company Grupo Lusófona, which started in 1998 with the private university Lusófona in Lisbon, Portugal. The Mindelo branch started in 2007, with a second cape verdean branch being established 2015 in the country´s capital Praia.
